item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Samvruth Raj, I go by Sam to avoid all the confusion of pronunciation, I am originally from Bangalore, India. This is my blog and over here you would find interesting findings about soccer or football, I am a big football enthusiast and I enjoy watching it.
